definition[0]: to move someone or something to a different place or job
example[0]: There are plans to redeploy 200 employees in the next six months.
definition[1]: to move workers to a different place or job
example[1]: Redeployed staff should be given consideration for vacancies occurring within any area of the Group.
definition[2]: to use assets in a different way
example[2]: Those planes are to be redeployed into more profitable areas of the company, such as charter activities and international operations.
